ImagingFrequency.description: ImagingFrequency is an optional field. If proivded it must be a number. Example. 123.262

Manufacturer.description: Manufacturer is an optional field. Example. Siemens

ManufacturersModelName.description: ManufacturersModelName is an optional field. Example. Prisma_fit

InstitutionName.description: InstitutionName is an optional field. Example. Stanford University

InstitutionalDepartmentName.description: InstitutionalDepartmentName is an optional field. Example. Psychiatary

InstitutionAddress.description: InstitutionAddress is an optional field. Example. 1234 Main St. City, CA 12345

DeviceSerialNumber.description: DeviceSerialNumber is an optional field. Example. 123456789

StationName.description: StationName is an optional field. Example. MRC35414

SeriesInstanceUID.description: SeriesInstanceUID must match above regex. Example. 1.3.12.2.1107.5.2.43.167004.2019030318311045850440175.0.0.0

StudyInstanceUID.description: StudyInstanceUID is an optional field. Example. 1.3.12.2.1107.5.2.43.167004.30000019022812230075700000061

ReferringPhysicianName.description: ReferringPhysicianName is an optional field. Example. Dr. Smith

PatientName.description: PatientName is an optional field. Example. John Doe

PatientSex.description: PatientSex is an optional field. Example. Male

PatientWeight.description: PatientWeight is an optional field. Example. 80

PatientPosition.description: PatientPosition is an optional field. Example. HFS

ProcedureStepDescription.description: ProcedureStepDescription is an optional field. Example. CRANEO_FUNCIONAL

SoftwareVersions.description: SoftwareVersions is an optional field. Example. Syngo_MR_E11

MRAcquisitionType.description: MRAcquisitionType could be any string, /[A-Za-z0-9-_.,!"'/$]*/". Example. 2D, 3D_GRASE

SeriesDescription.description: SeriesDescription must match /^[A-Za-z]{1+}/. Example. RetinotopicAtlas_Run1, fmri-head

ProtocolName.description: ProtocolName is an optional field. Example. RetinotopicAtlas_Run1

ScanningSequence.description: ScanningSequence is required and can be any string. Example. EPI

SequenceVariant.description: SequenceVariant is an optional field. Example. SK_SS

ScanOptions.description: ScanOptions is an optional field. Example. PFP_FS

SequenceName.description: SequenceName is an optional field. Example. epfid2d1_96

ImageType.description: ImageType is an optional field. Example. Mosaic

SeriesNumber.description: SeriesNumber is an optional field. Example. 62

AcquisitionTime.description: AcquisitionTime is an optional field. Example. 18:31:21

AcquisitionDateTime.description: AcquisitionDateTime is an optional field. Example. 3/3/2019  6:31:21 PM

AcquisitionNumber.description: AcquisitionNumber is an optional field. Example. 1

ImageComments.description: ImageComments is an optional field. Example. Unaliased_MB3_PE3_LB_SENSE1

SpacingBetweenSlices.description: SpacingBetweenSlices is an optional field. Example. 1

SAR.description: SAR is an optional field. Example. 0.0593594

FlipAngle.description: FlipAngle is an optional field. Example. 75

PartialFourier.description: PartialFourier is an optional field. Example. 0.875

BaseResolution.description: BaseResolution is an optional field. Example. 96

ShimSetting.description: ShimSetting is an optional field. Example. 76,-11164,-7059,545,24,-195,-86,15

TxRefAmp.description: TxRefAmp is an optional field. Example. 246.591

PhaseResolution.description: PhaseResolution is an optional field. Example. 1

ReceiveCoilName.description: ReceiveCoilName is an optional field. Example. HeadNeck_64

ReceiveCoilActiveElements.description: ReceiveCoilActiveElements is an optional field. Example. HC1-7;NC1,2

CoilString.description: CoilString is an optional field. Example. HC1-7;NC1_2

PulseSequenceDetails.description: PulseSequenceDetails is an optional field. Example. mbep2d_bold

WipMemBlock.description: WipMemBlock is an optional field. Example. 2b0a4368-108d-4a1e-8404-12d445946a00

ConsistencyInfo.description: ConsistencyInfo is an optional field. Example. N4_VE11C_LATEST_20160120

MultibandAccelerationFactor.description: MultibandAccelerationFactor is an optional field. Example. 3

PercentPhaseFOV.description: PercentPhaseFOV is an optional field. Example. 100

EchoTrainLength.description: EchoTrainLength is an optional field. Example. 84

PhaseEncodingSteps.description: PhaseEncodingSteps is an optional field. Example. 84

AcquisitionMatrixPE.description: AcquisitionMatrixPE is an optional field. Example. 96

ReconMatrixPE.description: ReconMatrixPE is an optional field. Example. 96

BandwidthPerPixelPhaseEncode.description: BandwidthPerPixelPhaseEncode is an optional field. Example. 17.96

EffectiveEchoSpacing.description: EffectiveEchoSpacing is an optional field. Example. 0.000579993

DerivedVendorReportedEchoSpacing.description: DerivedVendorReportedEchoSpacing is an optional field. Example. 0.000579993

TotalReadoutTime.description: TotalReadoutTime is an optional field. Example. 0.0550993

PixelBandwidth.description: PixelBandwidth is an optional field. Example. 2365

DwellTime.description: DwellTime is an optional field. Example. 0.0000022

PhaseEncodingDirection.description: PhaseEncodingDirection is an optional field. Example. j-

SliceTiming.description: SliceTiming is an optional field. Example. 0,0.825,1.65,1.5,0.525

ImageOrientationPatientDICOM.description: ImageOrientationPatientDICOM is an optional field. Example. 0.999369,-0.0247382,-0.0254766

InPlanePhaseEncodingDirectionDICOM.description: InPlanePhaseEncodingDirectionDICOM is an optional field. Example. COL

ConversionSoftware.description: ConversionSoftware is an optional field. Example. dcm2niix

ConversionSoftwareVersion.description: ConversionSoftwareVersion is an optional field. Example. v1.0.20181114  (JP2:OpenJPEG) GCC4.8.4

ClinicalTrialTimePointID.description: ClinicalTrialTimePointID is an optional field. Example. 11.1.2014

ClinicalTrialTimePointDescription.description: ClinicalTrialTimePointDescription is required and can be any string. Example. This is clinical trial is for drug Rx
